mapper.select: SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, FAC_SEQ_NO AS facSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, NOUSE_BRANCH_CODE AS nouseBranchCode, NOUSE_CORNER_CODE AS nouseCornerCode, NOUSE_FAC_GUBUN_CODE AS nouseFacGubunCode, NOUSE_FAC_CODE AS nouseFacCode, NOUSE_ASSET_SEQ_NO AS nouseAssetSeqNo, NOUSE_GUBUN AS nouseGubun, NEW_BRANCH_CODE AS newBranchCode, NEW_CORNER_CODE AS newCornerCode, NEW_FAC_GUBUN_CODE AS newFacGubunCode, NEW_FAC_CODE AS newFacCode, NEW_HIRE_FAC_ENABLE AS newHireFacEnable, NEW_INSTALL_ARTICLE_GUBUN AS newInstallArticleGubun, NEW_ASSET_SEQ_NO AS newAssetSeqNo, FAC_IP_ADDR AS facIpAddr, FAC_GW_ADDR AS facGwAddr, FAC_SMASK_ADDR AS facSmaskAddr, NEW_HIRE_FEE AS newHireFee FROM ATMS_02001220

SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, FAC_SEQ_NO AS facSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, NOUSE_BRANCH_CODE AS nouseBranchCode, NOUSE_CORNER_CODE AS nouseCornerCode, NOUSE_FAC_GUBUN_CODE AS nouseFacGubunCode, NOUSE_FAC_CODE AS nouseFacCode, NOUSE_ASSET_SEQ_NO AS nouseAssetSeqNo, NOUSE_GUBUN AS nouseGubun, NEW_BRANCH_CODE AS newBranchCode, NEW_CORNER_CODE AS newCornerCode, NEW_FAC_GUBUN_CODE AS newFacGubunCode, NEW_FAC_CODE AS newFacCode, NEW_HIRE_FAC_ENABLE AS newHireFacEnable, NEW_INSTALL_ARTICLE_GUBUN AS newInstallArticleGubun, NEW_ASSET_SEQ_NO AS newAssetSeqNo, FAC_IP_ADDR AS facIpAddr, FAC_GW_ADDR AS facGwAddr, FAC_SMASK_ADDR AS facSmaskAddr, NEW_HIRE_FEE AS newHireFee FROM ATMS_02001220 WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001220 SET FAC_SEQ_NO = #{facSeqNo}, CHANGE_CHASU = #{changeChasu}, STEXT_GUBUN = #{stextGubun}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, NOUSE_BRANCH_CODE = #{nouseBranchCode}, NOUSE_CORNER_CODE = #{nouseCornerCode}, NOUSE_FAC_GUBUN_CODE = #{nouseFacGubunCode}, NOUSE_FAC_CODE = #{nouseFacCode}, NOUSE_ASSET_SEQ_NO = #{nouseAssetSeqNo}, NOUSE_GUBUN = #{nouseGubun}, NEW_BRANCH_CODE = #{newBranchCode}, NEW_CORNER_CODE = #{newCornerCode}, NEW_FAC_GUBUN_CODE = #{newFacGubunCode}, NEW_FAC_CODE = #{newFacCode}, NEW_HIRE_FAC_ENABLE = #{newHireFacEnable}, NEW_INSTALL_ARTICLE_GUBUN = #{newInstallArticleGubun}, NEW_ASSET_SEQ_NO = #{newAssetSeqNo}, FAC_IP_ADDR = #{facIpAddr}, FAC_GW_ADDR = #{facGwAddr}, FAC_SMASK_ADDR = #{facSmaskAddr}, NEW_HIRE_FEE = #{newHireFee} WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001220 ( WORK_SEQ_NO, FAC_SEQ_NO, CHANGE_CHASU, STEXT_GUBUN, JISA_CODE, NOUSE_BRANCH_CODE, NOUSE_CORNER_CODE, NOUSE_FAC_GUBUN_CODE, NOUSE_FAC_CODE, NOUSE_ASSET_SEQ_NO, NOUSE_GUBUN, NEW_BRANCH_CODE, NEW_CORNER_CODE, NEW_FAC_GUBUN_CODE, NEW_FAC_CODE, NEW_HIRE_FAC_ENABLE, NEW_INSTALL_ARTICLE_GUBUN, NEW_ASSET_SEQ_NO, FAC_IP_ADDR, FAC_GW_ADDR, FAC_SMASK_ADDR, NEW_HIRE_FEE ) VALUES ( #{workSeqNo}, #{facSeqNo}, #{changeChasu}, #{stextGubun}, #{jisaCode}, #{nouseBranchCode}, #{nouseCornerCode}, #{nouseFacGubunCode}, #{nouseFacCode}, #{nouseAssetSeqNo}, #{nouseGubun}, #{newBranchCode}, #{newCornerCode}, #{newFacGubunCode}, #{newFacCode}, #{newHireFacEnable}, #{newInstallArticleGubun}, #{newAssetSeqNo}, #{facIpAddr}, #{facGwAddr}, #{facSmaskAddr}, #{newHireFee} )
